meanings.definition: A cosmetic applied around the eyes to accentuate them.
meanings.sent1: She bought new eyeliners to make her eyes stand out.
meanings.sent2: Her collection of eyeliners included various colors.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that even cats envy her eyeliners.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like perfectly drawn eyeliners, bold and striking.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering eyeliners made her eyes sparkle like stars.

meanings.sent1: The makeup artist was known as the best eyeliners in town.
meanings.sent2: She trained to become one of the top eyeliners in the industry.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to chat with the famous eyeliners.
meanings.sent4: She was the secret behind many celebrities' flawless eyeliners.
meanings.sent5: Her steady hand and precision made her a sought-after eyeliners.
